#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

double averageWeights(int weights[], int arraySize);

int main() {
    int weights[] = {5713, 6936, 8764, 6702, 8535, 8654, 8710, 8332, 4948, 7627, 5472, 5311, 7331, 8719, 6135, 6672, 5786, 7113, 5292, 6923, 5683, 7020, 8595, 8606, 6837, 7003, 7415, 8372, 8429, 5726, 8323, 6442, 8672, 6488, 6932, 5884, 6811, 7785, 7189, 5531,  
        6323, 8561, 8283, 5114, 6669, 7217, 8307, 6599, 6961, 8695, 6026, 5580, 6010, 4954, 8725, 4955, 5532, 7736, 5372, 8712, 8343, 5375, 5931, 6449, 8223, 5844, 5931, 5307, 5436, 6405, 8599, 6302, 8617, 8222, 5985, 8216, 5044, 5259, 6523, 7526, 8702, 5878,  
        7559, 5366, 5362, 7393, 6633, 8781, 6289, 6470, 5342, 7278, 5348, 8677, 5779, 5763, 5718, 8678, 6406, 8774, 5931, 7324, 6819, 6393, 5027, 7545, 8385, 8795, 8277, 8059, 6362, 6980, 5899, 5828, 6707, 7149, 5621, 7287, 5958, 6506, 6517, 5710, 5504, 7070,  
        8797, 6840, 7112, 6063, 7014, 5419, 7514, 7431, 7725, 5310, 6892, 8342, 4979, 6219, 6321, 6924, 7662, 8407, 5745, 8599, 5395, 8461, 7914, 5343, 5187, 4930, 4978, 8467, 6237, 7908, 6210, 7498, 6816, 7648, 8279, 8075, 7933, 7168, 5119, 7614, 7870, 7254,  
        7866, 6903, 8151, 8567, 8629, 5767, 6165, 6001, 7657, 6814, 8039, 6780, 8007, 6572, 5859, 8251, 5528, 5837, 5024, 8124, 5743, 5815, 7816, 5312, 7596, 7025, 4966, 5448, 6912, 8497, 6365, 6139, 8257, 6094, 8701, 8771, 6018, 8097, 5556, 6121, 8568, 6811,  
        8224, 4982, 5117, 8661, 8258, 5030, 8354, 5993, 7363, 6071, 8332, 6350, 5179, 7543, 6175, 5217, 8176, 7765, 5738, 8103, 5281, 7708, 7179, 5183, 8506, 5636, 6834, 7958, 5776, 6045, 8371, 8334, 6059, 8100, 6342, 5910, 7329, 7848, 8430, 5541, 5838, 6332,  
        7196, 6870, 7429, 6513, 6648, 6460, 5359, 5271, 7066, 6784, 5927, 5673, 6284, 7451, 6827, 8045, 8793, 7040, 5730, 8632, 8354, 5646, 6622, 6205, 6475, 6486, 5533, 8494, 7520, 6924, 5625, 6719, 4935, 5829, 5355, 4984, 6781, 5359, 6536, 8422, 7631, 5762,  
        7549, 6445, 7312, 6856, 7622, 6677, 5964, 7217, 5639, 5442, 4900, 8259, 7674, 6165, 7046, 6080, 6969, 6037, 7409, 6105, 6727, 7296, 5523, 7518, 5067, 6485, 8367, 7863, 8042, 5135, 7323, 7890, 6252, 5649, 5674, 8598, 7952, 6328, 8680, 5738, 5877, 5800,  
        5775, 6297, 5496, 5687, 7428, 4908, 8062, 6788, 8560, 6962, 5121, 5931, 6244, 5297, 6361, 5927, 7643, 7639, 7511, 5241, 7246, 5793, 5560, 6753, 5843, 4991, 6113, 7233, 7201, 6118, 5478, 5304, 6347, 5629, 4966, 6012, 6340, 5435, 5782, 7487, 8168, 6557,  
        8041, 5346, 8407, 7534, 5380, 7264, 6288, 8775, 7901, 7646, 6869, 5436, 8426, 5378, 7465, 5177, 8447, 5311, 6369, 6847, 6037, 6481, 8303, 6011, 7180, 8182, 6435, 5849, 6898, 7660, 6575, 5469, 7482, 6995, 8577, 6711, 5045, 7871, 5692, 7998, 8254, 6978};
    int arraySize = sizeof(weights) / sizeof(weights[0]);
    double average = averageWeights(weights, arraySize);

    printf("My average weight is: %lf\n", average);

    return 0;
}

double averageWeights(int weights[], int arraySize) {
    double sum;
    
    // add up the sum of all the weights
    for(int i = 0; i < arraySize; i++) {
        sum = sum + weights[i];
    }

    // divide sum by the array size to get the average weight
    sum = sum / arraySize;

    return sum;
}
